$\sum_{i=1}^{N-1} \sum_{j=i+1}^N (A_i \oplus A_j) = \sum_k \sum_{i=1}^{N-1} \sum_{j=i+1}^N ((A_i \& z_k) \oplus (A_j \& z_k))$ ã§ã‚ã‚Šã€å³ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰å½¢ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€$A_i \& z_k = 0$ ã¾ãŸã¯ $z_k$ ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§è¨ˆç®—ãŒç°¡å˜ã«ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

function parsepoints(n::Int)
    xs, ys = zeros(Int, n), zeros(Int, n)

function parsestrings(n)
    ss = Vector{String}(undef, n)
    for i in 1:n
        ss[i] = readline()
    end
    ss
end
